website_summaries.verdict: A scalp shampoo brush that comes with extra-long bristles for the best manual massage you can give your scalp.
pros: Uses a specially designed ergonomic handle that provides superior comfort
Extra-long plastic pins are soft to the touch without bending with thicker hair styles
cons: Plastic bristles can be too soft for a true, deep massage

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I have 4C hair and this helps with detangling. I use it while shampooing to detangle. Then I use it to comb through with the conditioner. Since using this it has saved me so much time because my hair stays detangled after the wash. I'm able to style right away.
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: Great for Itchy Scalps
customer_reviews.text: Such a great scalp scratcher. I'm always sure the shampoo penetrates my scalp when I use this. I haven't had any dandruff or build up on my since I started using this on wash day. The needles are coated with plastic and don't have any ridges that catch or pull my hair. The entire device is very smooth, small and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Bag Lady

customer_reviews.title: Super bendy & soft used for detangling!
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended this cute little brush for detangling long hair. The bristles are plastic but very bendy and soft. Because they give, it's helpful in removing tangles pain free. The brush is very light weight and goes over your four fingers to hold it. Super nice. I have nearly waist length hair that is lightened and I'm super careful what I do to prevent breaking the hair. I've even used it on wet hair. Great purchase! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Princessnana1999

customer_reviews.title: Worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Denman hair products before- just their hairbrushes though. What prompted this purchase was an adamant recommendation from a favorite curly hair blogger of mines, ClassyCurlies, so I went and bought this one designed specifically for use when shampooing my hair. Bottom line: I liked it so much- it's soothing & helps me clean my scalp better- that I quickly purchased one for my oldest son who admitted his scalp felt and looked healthier too after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy, Worth Every Penney!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this product is sooo cheap and wonderful! I used it to scrub my scalp for dirty and dandruff. It felt so good to massage my head with this! It fits perfectly in your hand and is very easy to use. The brush is hard enough to remove dirty while also being gentle to massage brain and give immediate relaxation. I recommend this brush to stylist or anyone who washes their own hair; clients will love you forever if you take your time and do it right!
customer_reviews.author: Shaundrea

customer_reviews.title: Great to remove scalp build up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this originally because I have scalp dermatitis. The bristles are not that painful when it touches the surface of your scalp. The actual object is exactly as pictured. I would highly recommend for anyone with dermatitis or whoever has scalp build-up!
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we wanted for scrubbing our hair in the shower. It's easy to hold and is doing a good job getting rid of dandruff. And it feels like a head massage! Have been using it for 3 months and no complaints except that over time, it does get full of hair, like a hairbrush, and you have to clean it out because the hairs wrap around the bristles and don't just rinse out. You have to grab them and pull them out, just like cleaning a hairbrush. I can't imagine a way for this not to happen, so I still give this 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Soper

customer_reviews.title: Head scrubber with financial rage
customer_reviews.text: Scrubs my head good. Feel taken advantage of on the price though. Shouldn’t plastic be free at this point? Like what’s the margin on this thing? You can’t divide by zero so my best guess is infinite. Plus, if you’re going to let me kill the planet don’t charge me for it bro. That’s super evil. Like Mussolini evil. Like Milli Vanilli evil. Like that scene in ghostbusters where they melt the lovable Pillsbury dough boy evil. On second though that annoying thing might be the most evil of all. Forgot that last part. Just send me one of these one a month for life and we’ll call it good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THAT is the one I was looking for. Gonna buy a spare backup. There are a lot of different brushes of this type but this one is the best in my opinion because of the soft rubber and the handle which makes it easy to use and the handle is a way to hang it on a hook in the shower to keep it handy.
customer_reviews.author: Howard H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing. Will never shower without one again.
customer_reviews.text: Will never again wash my hair or beard without it! Absolutely the best and feels great. It helps get ingrown hairs out in your beard and loosen all the dead skin to help keep scalp and face clean! Actually going to buy more to make sure I have one in my gym bag and to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a real find for me since I have A LOT of very thick hair. It’s hard for my scalp to ever feel really clean, but this product has made a huge difference. It has teeth that are much longer than the norm, making it so much easier to reach my scalp through my thick hair. I am so glad I found it on Amazon and purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Summer3

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands and I can fit my entire hand in the little handle part, which I like. It is much nicer than the purple one I ordered a while back since the bristles are longer and much more durable. It also is at a curve that matches the curve on my head. I have an itchy scalp and I use that to help clean it. While my scalp is still itchy, it works much better than my fingernails!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So great my husband wanted one - but pulls hair!
customer_reviews.text: My hair was getting really greasy with build up. This changed everything. And my husband liked it so much we had to buy a second one for him! The only problem is that my hair pulls out kinda easy... so I have to be careful, otherwise, it pulls out A LOT of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: NerdGirl_LA

customer_reviews.title: Almost makes me feel like I want to go to sleep afterwards
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is, my scalp is loving the massage this little denman Be-Bop has. It's small with a big punch. A few circular motions around your scalp and the tingle is on baby!! Almost makes me feel like I want to go to sleep afterwards. :) Also found that it's a great hair lifter - similar to a pick - found that interesting. When I'm done with the massage, I have an afro. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Shavier

customer_reviews.title: Works, but Is Hard on Hair
customer_reviews.text: I like how this makes my hair feel when I use it, but it pulls out SO MUCH of my hair. My hair is very thin and I shed quite a bit anyway, but I had to stop using this because I was sure it was going to make me bald. It might just be my hair, but I can't use it unless I'm very careful.
customer_reviews.author: T. Volpe

customer_reviews.title: Handle Pops Out of Place Not Very Sturdy for thick Hair
customer_reviews.text: Used on my daughter and son's thick curly hair the handle broke off after second "comb through" . I was able to push the broken handle back into place but it continues to come apart during brushing. I had high hopes for this brush because it cost more than a traditional shampoo brush..I will just continue to buy the cheap brushes and replace regularly
customer_reviews.author: MsAubrella

customer_reviews.title: Glides like A Charm
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to but this base ion the reviews. Thanks lot reviews stating it's not the product shown in the picture. However, I went ahead and ordered it anyway. The item can super fast, and it the exact item shown in the picture. It works great on wet or slightly damp hair. My hair is very coarse, and it's perfect for my hair. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Really rough on scalp
customer_reviews.text: I thought the teeth on this would be flexible and they are very hard plastic. It actually hurts my scalp and tangles my hair more.
customer_reviews.author: ajw

customer_reviews.title: My Scalp Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Massaging my scalp while I am washing my hair with a "no poo" shampoo is a great experience. Not only does it feel great, but it also gets the sebum moving and my hair feels and looks a thousand times better. And my hair is getting thicker – who knew? At 68, I have thick hair again.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Here

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: No better then the one I purchased in Hong Kong at a flee market. Very disappointed not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Real Estate Appraiser

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had small patches of dry scalp and this brush has helped me out so much. My scalp feels so much freasher. I don't know how to describe how it feels but it makes every wash feel cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It is so good at getting product through hair (I have shoulder length
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this to be as neat as it is. I bought it because I figured it would just be kind of relaxing. It is so good at getting product through hair (I have shoulder length, thick, and wavy hair and this has no problem gliding through it)! My husband borrows it so he can work his beard products in and he loves it. Definitely going to have to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Per

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: This right here is a life saver! I have really bad scalp problems and bad dandruff, it cleans up all of the dandruff and feels like heaven! Plus it easily detangles any knots.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron and Kellie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Curl Enhancement
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that I could hold it during the washing time. But it doesn’t appear to be that sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Using this actually hurts my head. The little prongs are a pretty hard plastic. you have to be very careful/gently while using. my fingers do the jobs better and with less damage to my scalp. Maybe better with VERY, VERY thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Meg M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Tines are firm enough to scratch your scalp but rounded and flexible enough not to scrape. Handle is surprisingly comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mitchum

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This massage brush feels so good on my scalp and it detangles my hair with ease. Makes my curls more defined also. Definitely worth the money i paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Geneva H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this massager
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager. It works really well for my medium-length hair. It would also work well for short hair, but because I do not have long hair I cannot state to that. The prongs are firm, but not that hard, sharp plastic that I was worried it would contain.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Thomsen Minenga

customer_reviews.title: Good for fighting dandruff
customer_reviews.text: I get very bad dandruff, but using this tool to massage my scalp in the shower each day has made a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The handle broke really easily. While I could pop it back into place
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this brush to detangle my hair. The handle broke really easily. While I could pop it back into place, it was annoying to keep doing so during the detangling process. Please make the handle of this brush stronger. Other than that, I really enjoy this product - only thing that helps distribute product and detangle my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Joyus Oko

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: So I know a lot of people say they have thick hair but I really have thick thick hair from my roots to ends. I really wanted something that would massage and help my scalp with my severe dandruff. The spikes are not long enough to the job for me and I feel like using my fingers is just overall easier.
customer_reviews.author: StarGazer

customer_reviews.title: not too hard, not too soft, just right.
customer_reviews.text: the bristles aren't too soft or too hard, just right. I have had several other scalp massage brushes and they were mostly too hard. This one has bristles that are stiff enough to get the job done but not so hard that they are uncomfortable. Also, they aren't so pointed that they scratch too hard. Not so with this one. I am very satisfied with this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Be bop brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush gives a good massage to the scalp and de tangled my hair well. I don't fancy the handle, it is to flimsy, short and keeps popping out.
customer_reviews.author: Rubbermaid

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for one of these things to replace the one I've had for years, but forgot where I got it. Finding this one on Amazon, and one with perfect length bristles that just glides along and brings a wonderful soft massage to my head as I'm washing my hair is just great. A minor life problem, solved now, forever! Thank you, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: PMcCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Handle was very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The handle is not sturdy at all. But it does the job. I wish the handle was more durable
customer_reviews.author: NeNe

customer_reviews.title: O.K product
customer_reviews.text: Nice massage, but not as good as the battery-operated ones.would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: My clients love this. I keep this at the shampoo bowl ...
customer_reviews.text: My clients love this. I keep this at the shampoo bowl and use it on my clients with dry scalp. It helps with lifting the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra B

customer_reviews.title: Hair Stylist recommended highly. Her entire family uses this massage brush ...
customer_reviews.text: Hair Stylist recommended highly. Her entire family uses this massage brush to shampoo their hair. Kiddo wasn't washing scalp well or rinsing shampoo from hair well. Perfect fix!
customer_reviews.author: dtslack

customer_reviews.title: This is a decent item
customer_reviews.text: This is a plastic scalp brush used to shampoo your hair and massage your scalp. It's plastic and will/should last forever. Some like it, others done. I found it was fine. The more the lather of shampoo, the "softer" this thing felt. But, it ultimately comes down to how much pressure you use when using this device. I actually like this and still use them to this day.
customer_reviews.author: terster

customer_reviews.title: My hair is happy.
customer_reviews.text: I'd have to admit I was a little skeptical on how this would be better than a comb or regular brush, but this is the go to brush for me. I have 3-4 inch long hair and I can style my hair with ease with this. It doesn't pull out my hair. My hair doesn't get tangled. It is small enough where it doesn't take much room for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Scalp Messaging Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this! What a comfortable experience and also functional! It really messages the scalp well and leaves it feeling so much better! I would highly recommend this item to anyone interested... it is well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: iskeyedive

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I really need to clean my scalp
customer_reviews.author: JerZgal94

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scalp Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful scalp brush. A very good buy. I use it every time I wash my hair and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing new under the sun, this included!
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid we used these and everyone bought one. So I did again after seeing that people use them on you tube. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: farmgal

customer_reviews.title: Gift for tween daughter, helpful for massaging in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift for tween daughter, helpful for massaging in the shampoo fully when they tend to go a little too quickly and also helpful for removing dry scalp flakes that can lead to dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: John IV

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Feels amazing. Scalp has been healthier, I swear my hair is growing more quickly, it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: maryamelia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well to help lift dead skin cells that have accumulated due to dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel2

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item to assist with deep scalp scrubbing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to assist with deep scalp scrubbing as I suffer with persistent acne on my scalp due to a hormone imbalance. It works well, the only thing I would note is that if your head is really sensitive for whatever reason (mine being Pilar Cysts), it may be too hard of bristle for you.
customer_reviews.author: PH_Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and easy to hold onto
customer_reviews.text: I've used this sort of a scalp massager for a long time - mostly as a detangler for my long hair. I wanted an extra one for my gym bag and bought this one. My only complaint is that the the small gap where the handles attaches to the 'brush' hangs onto my hair when I try to remove the hair after brushing. Would prefer a one piece molded design.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting these bristles to be a bit softer but ...
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting these bristles to be a bit softer but they feel kind of hard on the scalp. Might look for something else for a massager.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Too sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love my Denman brush, so I was sad when this didn't work. The bristles are way too sharp and it hurts to use. I barely applied any pressure while using it and I could not continue. Does not feel like a massage, but someone's sharp nails scraping my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean my scalp while shampooing, massage my scalp; while deep condition, and detangle while I styling my hair This brush is EVERYTHING wonderful! It's sturdy, strong, and the bristles are a perfect length for long thick hair like mine. After the 1st use I told all my friends they need this and ordered one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: Good massage area, back loop makes a little awkward to grip, but serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Good product! Works well. I would have given a 6th star, if the back loop were narrower (made for 1 or 2 fingers instead of 3 or 4 fingers). It was a little awkward to use until I figured out how to make it a little more comfortable to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Bill

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TO MASSAGE AN SCUB N SHAMPOO HAIR ,HAVE BEEN USING DENMAN PRODUCTS FOR NEARLY 30 YRS. ONE WORD SUMS IT UP "EXCELLENT" ,, FEELS GREAT FOR SHAMPOOING HAIR AN SCALP
customer_reviews.author: Kay R.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty underwhelmed by this. It feels great, but it doesn't really penetrate my thick curly hair very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard
customer_reviews.text: This brush made my daughter’s scalp bleed. The bristles are made of HARD plastic that do not bend or “give” in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Disnee12352

customer_reviews.title: very cool
customer_reviews.text: Growing up my dad had one like this, never knew why he used it. Now I know.. really cool.
customer_reviews.author: I.A.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made handle
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Love this brush but the handle is poorly made and keeps breaking because one of the pieces will pops out. I've only had this brush for a couple months. For the price it should last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Annasi

customer_reviews.title: It looks average.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very average. But will still try it & see. Shipping was satisfactory. Will follow up once I get a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Genell Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is such a nice brush when your washing your hair
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice brush when your washing your hair, especially if you don't like scratching. I have a sensitive scalp and this is perfect, it doesn't make it hurt and also is very relaxing😸 Only con is this is made out of plastic and the band that your put your hand through pops out sometimes, so you have to keep putting it back in😒 but otherwise it's really nice
customer_reviews.author: Siani H

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: It feels nice, but you need to be careful not to apply too much strength, to it will scratch. It makes my hair super tangled too.
customer_reviews.author: Cuca1003

customer_reviews.title: great massage
customer_reviews.text: This brush is durable, does not hurt your head, gives a great head massage. I have small hands my fingers fit perfectly under the handle grip. Don't spend your money on more expensive massage brushes till you have at least tried this one first.
customer_reviews.author: djy

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: this massage brush really works well,at first i'm kinda having a second thought coz i dont know if this can damage my scalp,but while im using it for the first it really felt good it wasn't hurt your scalp and i used this once to my daughter and she said" mom i like that hair brush".
customer_reviews.author: Momofkkp

customer_reviews.title: Great little brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a brush that I've had for many years. The old one just started falling apart. The new one is small enough to take with me on trips and works well. Oh how I wish amazon would just let you say it's a good brush and let it go at that.
customer_reviews.author: Bob0a

customer_reviews.title: This brush is not good at all the first time I started using it ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush is not good at all the first time I started using it the handle start out and the prices really expensive. The picture look big and the actual brush way different its very small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tangles hair! I gave product a 2 star since ...
customer_reviews.text: Tangles hair! I gave product a 2 star since it arrives as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bristles to hard for my beard But ok for your head
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the handle broke. It's not strong enough
customer_reviews.author: missmaddi

customer_reviews.title: A simple necessity
customer_reviews.text: It is a simple device and easy to use. I would recommend this to anyone who has curly hair and or needs to cleanse their scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wash day is much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Great for detangling natural type 4c hair on wet/damp hair and defines your coils and curls.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Love this little jewel!
customer_reviews.text: This makes my head tingle with joy as I was my hair, and is still gentle on my face for use in by beard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not For Thick Hair.
customer_reviews.text: It broke within a week of use. But when it wasn’t broken it was wonderful. Ended up just buying an actual denman brush.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great brush - detangles easily, massages the scalp and leaves your hair nice and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Eire

customer_reviews.title: Best Scalp scrubber
customer_reviews.text: The Denman is firmer that another brand that I tried. It is also a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: definitely not worth 6 dollars. It was so flimsy feeling had to be very careful not to break
customer_reviews.author: Catherina Meow Meow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My only issue, I didn't realize the handle is detachable
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Good for massages
customer_reviews.text: I used it while shampooing my hair. It was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and quality item.Fast ship.Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive product to use for hair washing. Cleans hair while stimulating hair follicles. Sturdy, last a long time. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great hair tool
customer_reviews.text: Love how it feels on my scalp. I feel like its just the right amount of pressure to get the blood flowing
customer_reviews.author: Radmom01

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works Really Good To Get Out Tangles And Detangles My Thick 4c Hair Easily
customer_reviews.author: Andriel

customer_reviews.title: works and feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Never used one of these before. works and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not meant for thick hair. Kind of on the small side
customer_reviews.author: Lady L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scalp brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect brush for your scalp. It is not too hard, not too soft. Will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight. One time thru my daughter's hair and it broke. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice long massaging bristles
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took it from her brother! Nice long massaging bristles. This was the favored of the several types and brands we tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Tuesday

customer_reviews.title: it does work pretty good on very thick natural hair
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting massage hair brush to be a little bigger than it was. However, it does work pretty good on very thick natural hair
customer_reviews.author: Roschawn

customer_reviews.title: love these things
customer_reviews.text: I worked at a salon 30+ years ago and was introduced to these. since then I use them all the time.. great on the scalp and really good on the beard/stache..
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better than Most scrubbers
customer_reviews.text: Love the scrubbing rubber prongs on the massagers, penetrating better in the scalp. It's better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Kokonana

customer_reviews.title: Love this little massage brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this little massage brush! I'm going to buy one for my sons and husband as a stocking stuffer for Christmas. PERFECT !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is the closest thing to perfection that I have found. Although slightly soft, it works the hair and the scalp the best way. Best among those that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hamp

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, not too expensive. The handle can come loose (happened once) and snapped back on. Would be better if it was all one piece. Still, glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: T. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it every time I shampoo and condition my hair, helps me massage my scalp and get any loose dandruff or flakes out.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: DENMAN Shampoo Massage Brush
customer_reviews.text: The DENMAN Shampoo Massage Brush is the BEST! It has long enough tines, a comfortable handle, gives a great massage, and works better than the others now available! It helps alleviate my oily skin condition to get my hair clean!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Piepgrass

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good!!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks in pics but reading is fundamental and I didnt read the description..
customer_reviews.author: Whitty

customer_reviews.title: It gently detangles my thick hair from the root and feels great on my scalp
customer_reviews.text: This little brush works wonders! It gently detangles my thick hair from the root and feels great on my scalp!
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: Like most shampoo brushes, the bristles are too stiff. If you like stiff bristles, this may suit you. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it can comb over even though thick hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good comb but would be best with thinner, shorter hair.
customer_reviews.author: supercriticalgirl

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in my hand and feels like an amazing scalp massage
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my hand and feels like an amazing scalp massage. Doesnt hurt at all. It makes washing my hair fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The brush's teeth really get to your scalp well. ...
customer_reviews.text: The brush's teeth really get to your scalp well.Only 4 stars due to the product being a bit pricey for the plastic brush.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

product_meta.title: Denman Palm Styler for Detangling, Massaging & Styling D6
feature_bullets: SOFT PINS: Gently massage, detangle and invigorate the scalp.
MATERIAL: The waterproof material & hand-strap mean you can safely use in the bath or shower to massage or distribute or remove shampoo or conditioner.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGN: The brush's circular pattern & hand-strap is suitable for those with limited finger dexterity.
PROMOTES: Blood circulation and massages your scalp in the shower which eases itchiness.
CARE INSTRUCTION: Wash in warm, soapy water. Rinse and leave to dry away from direct heat and sunlight.
